title: We shall prevent HKSAR officers being attacked

replies.msg:
It is indeed protesters appear in everywhere except China.
In order to protect our HKSAR officers, we should not let them enter the democracy countries.

Please, protect the lives of HKSAR officers, deny their entry to UK, US, Australia, Europe, Canada, etc.

[事後檢討]請堅守原則，勿墮落為暴政魔警
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
https://lih.kg/1725525
Foreign countries need to protect themselves by rejecting the entry of HKSAR officers & HKRP(RIOT)
